text:
@NAkufoAddo this energy of intimidating Voltarians is what we needed when coronavirus was first recorded to close our borders. You have failed woefully and are now relying on Insha Allah and people’s immune systems, while those who who don’t die. 
Election over lives, we see it

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
